ygData.subject: Re: Here's a clip from the elite Innoruuk guild.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am one of the biggest fans of your guild.  I respect you all as players a lot.  The time and effort you spending into the mechanics of the game intrigues
ygData.messageBody:
> Bards, well, we invited Tokisada to most of our raids, and
> Weadaneye to almost all of them. We had room for bards, and we happy
> invited bards from other guilds to come and help. Weadaneye has Evensong
> and a Six Note Blade now, and both have Selo's Drum/Orbs, so it's no
> secret we appreciate their time and effort.

I am one of the biggest fans of your guild. I respect you all
as players a lot. The time and effort you spending into the
mechanics of the game intrigues me. I am a quantitative person,
and I like to figure out how things work. I've asked to come
on raids before, never even got a response from your GM. I would
love to help you all out by learning some things, but there's no
way for me to get Selo's Drum or McVax's Horn if I don't first
go to a dragon raid. Conversely, not responding to me, and ignoring
me also leaves a bad taste in my mouth.

I'm just a bard looking for a piece of the action.

Harm.
